> "Gotta - make it outa here no matter what. Wheels needs me, I can't just =
drop 'em like a pile of scrap, I can't. He's probably the only friend I got=
 other than my comrades. And besides, he's leader material, and if anyone c=
an give glory back ta the Autobots, it's him. Forget about Rodimus steppn' =
up ta the plate, he's far too gone now. And I wonder, I wonder what would h=
appen if Tucson was able ta break the hold on Roddie, what will everyone th=
ink of him once he came clean again? I sure know what I'd think.. I'd think=
 he's yesterday's news. Trust him again, yeah, right, over my dead aft I'll=
 trust that guy again. Fancy paint job or no fancy paint job, he ain't no O=
ptimus Prime like Wheels."
>
> Thought Rat Trap as he quietly and slowly ma=
kes his way through the vent pipes of the base.

Scourge slowly walked down=
 the corridor nearest to Rat Trap's
position, the small cannon mount on his=
 head extending a red beam that
played itself along the wall. "I sense you =
Ratling." Scourge hissed in
low tones. "You are behind the walls, cowering =
where you think we
can't get you." His voice is deep and soft, almost as if=
 he were
talking more to himself then to Rat Trap - and perhaps he was. He
=
snickered quietly.

Cyclonus followed Scourge a few steps back, allowing hi=
s more adept
tracker take the point on this one. For his own sake he kept h=
is
optics on full, watching the walls and cieling as well as the floor
ahea=
d, you never know where the next Maximal would appear - they
seemed to be j=
umping out of the very walls today.

Scourge suddenly came to a stop as he =
looked at a section of wall, one
that to the casual observer didn't look an=
y different than any other,
but for him it brought a smile. He glanced back=
 at Perceptor and
Cyclonus and then back at the wall. He oriented his rifle=
 at the wall,
and with a precisely targeted disintegration blast, fired at =
Rat
Trap's position through the wall!

OOc: Scourge is being careful to tar=
get only Rat Trap, and not
anything important like circuitry! :)
